translations: [心理] 外胚层体型者；[人类] 瘦型体质者

sentences.sentence: So if you are not so much of an ectomorph or are clearly endomorph, you will need to work even harder.
sentences.translation: 所以，如果你是一个外胚基因很少的姑娘，或是内胚基因过于强大的姑娘，也不是不行，只不过是需求更多的努力而已。

sentences.sentence: The mesomorph may not need as much protein as an ectomorph because an ectomorph's body is probably burning more protein as energy than the mesomprph.
sentences.translation: “中型体质者”比“瘦型体质者”需要的蛋白质量要少，因为“瘦型体质者”可能会分解更多的蛋白质来提供能量。

sentences.sentence: The results showed: (1) Among boys, the mean somatotypes in age groups 6—8 are balanced mesomorph, 9—12 are central, and change to meso ectomorph in age 13—17;
sentences.translation: 结果表明：（1）男生6— 8岁各组为均衡的中胚层体型，9— 12岁各组为三胚层中间型体型，13— 17岁各组为中胚层-外胚层均衡型体型。
